actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal courts from issuing busing orders based on race.

summary.text: Antibusing Act - Provides that no court of the United States shall have jurisdiction to make any decision, enter any judgment, or issue any order the effect of which would be to require that pupils be transported to or from school, on the basis of their race, color, religion, or national origin. Prohibits any Federal agency from inducing such transportation through withholding or threatening to withhold Federal financial assistance. Provides that no person who, by reason of any Federal court order in effect as of the date of the enactment of this Act, is required to provide such transportation shall be so required on or after that date. States that any case in which such order was granted shall be reopened on the motion of any party.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal courts from issuing busing orders based on race.
